description: An update on the latest replication features in PostgreSQL 9.3, plus key points on how the existing technologies of hot standby and synchronous replication work in the real world. Simon will cover new features from Fujii Masao, Heikki Linnakangas, himself and others in an around the core replication features.
short_description: An update on the latest replication features in PostgreSQL 9.3, plus key points on how the existing technologies of hot standby
title: Simon Riggs: Replication Refresh
